description: This PHP source file generates a web page for displaying connected USB device information in a router's web interface. It includes headers, navigation, and iterates over USB device data to present details such as status, description, serial number, speed, and manufacturer.

methods.name: getInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves a comma-separated list of device instance IDs for connected USB devices.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of a specified configuration parameter.
